title: RBI Recruitment 2017 Medical Consultant/Manager Vacancy Notification
text: Medical Consultant What will be the required qualification ? Applying candidates must possess Degree of MBBS degree of any recognized university by the Medical Council of India in the allopathic system of medicine. Those candidates who have post graduate degree in General Medicine can also apply for stated positions. Appliers must have minimum of 2 (two) years experience in any hospital or as Medical Practitioner The applicants having their own private dispensary or place of residence within a radius of 5 Kms. from the dispensary at the aforementioned Officers’ Quarters will be given preference. What will be the upper age limit ? Candidate must meet age- criteria according to the posts. Age relaxations will be applicable to deserving candidates as per the rules. Offered Salary : After successfully completion of assortment process the appointed applicants for Reserve Bank of India Vacancies will get fixed remuneration of Rs. 750/- per hour for the first three years of contractual service and 950/- per hour after completion of three years of contractual service. Out of total monthly remuneration a sum of Rs. 1000/- will be treated as conveyance expense and Reimbursement of mobile charges of Rs. 1,000/- per month will also be provided. Download PDF: RBI Recruitment Official Notification Mode of Hiring : Job hunters will be finally recruited for vacancies in government sector as per their personal Interview which will be organized by the selection panel of Reserve Bank Of India. In Which Color Interviewer Will Love To See You Procedure to Apply : Candidates, who have eligibility criteria, can apply against this latest government bank jobs notification, by following some necessary steps, provided below. Desirous candidates for RBI Careers need to visit the official web portal of Reserve Bank Of India that is www.rbi.org.in. Now press on ‘Opportunity@RBI’ section which is observable at the bottom of home page right side. After that you are required to choose ‘Current Vacancies’ tab from top menu bar and select ‘Vacancies’ option. Then select link “Engagement of Medical Consultant (Part-Time) on contract basis with fixed hourly remuneration” link. After that RBI Recruitment Notification will be opened in PDF Form and read it carefully. After reading complete details download the application, take a print out of it Now you are required to fill all the correct and complete details in accurate manner. Attach all the photocopies of all certificates and testimonials and pass port size photo should be submitted at address tuned below. Finally send it to address mentioned below. Postal Address : To reach the Regional Director, Reserve Bank of India, Human Resource Management Department (Recruitment Section), Mahatma Gandhi Marg, Kanpur – 208 001
